page.title: 19 HIXON AIRFIELD INDUSTRIES.
page.content: Hixon Airfield Industrial Estate was first set up in 1959 by Envirocor.The Managing Director, Mr Rowley Tongue runs his own light aircraft on the air-strip. Now the war-time air field is a part of local history and is farmed by Mr Tongue. He rents the rest of the air field to other companies which include: Tarcam-Contract packing specialists. B.D. Fuels- Texaco distributors Cornings Ltd.-specialists glass producers Maxi Haulage and storage-distributors of goods. The following page is a case study on B.D. Fuels.
